message.body: Hey gf,,, how much do I owe u for the cake
Oh milk choc frost (not dark) n I guess like a yellow pound cake
Yellow pound cake or yellow cake?
Yellow cake n how much do I owe u
One layer or two? Cake pan is 14 3/4 by 11 3/4 inches
One layer is fine... Cause we have other desert
Ok ill price it up real quick...
Thanx a million,,, r u gonna come n if so take stef ,,, I txt victor gotta txt mike
Is it at your house? And what time? Bec I have 2 other cake orders due that weekend plus a baby shower
Yep my house between 230 prob til 500
Oh thts ok if u can't make it woulda been nice to c u guys'll
Ok ill try to swing by around that time... I think baby shower is at 5 so just depends on if I finish the other cakes in time. One cake order is for the baby shower so might be cutting close.
Okie dokie talk to u later n thx again
